report_title: Plus-Size Women's Clothing Stores Industry Report
executive_summary: The Plus-Size Women's Clothing Stores industry has benefited from an expanding market and favorable economic conditions over the past five years. As the economy strengthened and per capita disposable income amplified, plus-size consumers had more to spend on clothing and discretionary purchases. The number of plus-size adults has steadily expanded...

current_performance.current_performance_point_description: Revenue has expanded at a CAGR of 2.2% over the past five years to reach an estimated $12.7 billion in 2023, when revenue is forecast to inflate by 1.5% and profit will reach 2.3%.

future_outlook.future_outlook_point_description: Over the next five years, revenue for plus-size women's clothing stores will multiply at a CAGR of 1.3%, reaching an estimated $13.6 billion in 2028, when profit is set to reach 2.7%.

future_outlook.future_outlook_point_title: Competition from mass merchandisers and fast fashion
future_outlook.future_outlook_point_description: As cultural trends continue evolving to embrace plus-size fashion, competition from nonspecialty retailers will intensify as everyone vies for a slice of the plus-size market.
Plus-size fashion will continue becoming more mainstream, with events like New York Fashion Week Plus, Full Figured Fashion Week and celebrity endorsements...
Over the next five years, expanding environmental awareness will prompt plus-size retailers to focus more on sustainable and ethical fashion.

industry_definition: Retailers in this industry specialize in plus-size women's clothing, which is clothing proportioned specifically for larger women...

negative_impact_factors: Low profit compared to sector average

key_trends: To compete with online-only retailers, many industry operators have launched and enhanced their own e-commerce channels
Many new and existing plus-size activewear lines have outperformed other lines with limited sizing

products_and_services.product_description: This segment includes casual and formal dresses of all lengths...
